Atoning.Effect: Evil aligned creatures (non-humanoid) take 1D4 extra radiant damage on a successful hit. Must succeed on a DC8 wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the attacker for 10 rounds or until Line of sight is broken. Requires attunement.

Shadowed**.Effect: +1 to hit at night or in low light.

Swift**.Effect: If the bearer is first in initiative order they may treat this weapon as a +1 weapon.

Haunted.Effect: Apparitions appear and add +2 necrotic damage to a target should they fail a DC10 wisdom saving throw. On a critical failure the wielder must succeed on the same saving throw or take +4 necrotic damage.

Icy.Effect: Target takes 1D4 ice damage on a successful hit.

Masked**.Effect: A masking oil has been used to permeate the weapon. It soaks up all odours from the wielder making them effectively odourless. Advantage on all stealth checks made out of combat.

Tithed Blessing.Effect: 10 gold coins are laid out on the sigil carved onto the weapon and necessary prayers are said to hieroneous. The weapon is treated as a +1 weapon until the next long rest unless the player targets a creature that is not proven to be guilty. The 10 gold coins are consumed. Requires attunement unless the wielder is a paladin or cleric.

Victorious.Effect: Whenever the wielder kills a creature, they gain temporary hit points equal to the creatures CR (minimum of 1, round up). Effect lasts one hour.

Dazing.Effect: Holds intelligence modifier +1 charges per long rest. Before making a ranged attack, you can spend one charge to attempt to stun the creature you attacked. They must succeed on a DC8 Constitution save or become stunned until the end of your next turn. Requires attunement.

Uncertain.Effect: If an odd number is rolled during the damage roll, roll an additional 1D4 damage.

Illuminated**.Effect: Covered in beautiful religious depictions. +2 to religion checks. Does not stack with other Illuminated items.

Spry.Effect: Once per long rest, you are granted 1 extra action, which you may only use to Attack (1 attack), Hide or Disengage. This effect cannot be used again until you have completed a long rest.

Vexing**.Effect: An enemy hit by this weapon must make a DC10 wisdom saving throw. On a fail, they will recklessly attack the wielder regardless of the situation.

Weakening.Effect: A critical hit prevents the target from gaining hit points until its next turn.

Impeding.Effect: The target’s movement speed is slowed by 5 ft if the target fails a DC12 constitution saving throw. It must succeed on the saving throw to remove this effect.

Sparking.Effect: Target takes 1D4 lighting damage on a successful hit.

Protected**.Effect: Bears effective spells that deter possession. Adds a +2 bonus to charisma saving throws when preventing possession.

Fully Ceramic.Effect: The armour is mostly ceramic. Gain +2 AC when an enemy is attacking you with Lightning damage.

Medic's.Effect: The armour has many pockets and compartments stocked with medical supplies. Treat this armour as a healer's kit.

Consecrated.Effect: Gain +1 to AC if the wearer is being attacked by an undead, devil or demonic foe.

Blessed.Effect: When receiving healing from a party member, add 1D4 temporary HP until the end of combat.

Sprinter's.Effect: Once per combat encounter, you may take a free dash action. Requires attunement.

Swindler's.Effect: Contains a hidden pocket in the sleeve. Gain +1 to sleight of hand checks.

Cobra.Effect: The armour bears several tiny hidden spikes covered in poison. Any creature that successfully hits you with an appendage must make a DC10 constitution saving throw or take 1D6 poison damage.

Excellent***.Effect: +1 on rolls to hit and damage dice

Potent Magefire.Effect: Adds 1D6 fire damage to damage roll. Requires attunement (short rest)

Vindicating.Effect: Evil aligned creatures (non-humanoid) take 1D6 extra damage on a successful hit. Must succeed on a DC10 wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the attacker for 10 rounds or until Line of sight is broken.

Bound.Effect: The bearer can spend an action to mystically bind themselves to the weapon and cannot be disarmed. They cannot change to another weapon for the duration of the encounter. Requires attunement.

Nocturnal.Effect: +2 to hit at night or in low light. Requires attunement

Frigid.Effect: Target takes 1D6 additional ice damage on a successful hit. Requires attunement

Stalking.Effect: Twice per long rest, a missed attack can be re-rolled when using this weapon.

Nullifying.Effect: An enemy spellcaster hit by this weapon must roll a D10. On a 1, the spellcaster can no longer target the shooter with any spells of the player’s level or lower during their next turn.

Viaticum.Effect: The weapon is inscribed with the last rites. Once per long rest the weapon can cast the bane spell against an undead enemy of CR2 or below.

Skilled assassin\u2019s.Effect: The wielder of the weapon gains a +2 to stealth checks. The weapon cannot be detected by a detect magic spell unless the caster touches the item.

Reckless.Effect: When attacking with this weapon, you may choose to attack recklessly. Doing so, you gain advantage on your attack, but you incur advantage on attacks against you until the start of your next turn.

Paralysing.Effect: Holds intelligence modifier +1 charges per long rest. Before making a ranged attack, you can spend one charge to attempt to stun the creature you attacked. They must succeed on a DC10 Constitution save or become stunned until the end of your next turn.

Dire.Effect: This weapon oozes sinister vibes. Adds +3 to intimidation checks. If you are first or last in initiative order, you will be prioritised by the enemies.

Temple of Dewror.Effect: While the bearer is at 0 hp, they are visited by an angel of Dewror, the indomitable God. The bearer has advantage on death saving throws and cannot recall details about the angel if they wake. A long rest is required until this feature can be activated again. Requires attunement.

Identifying.Effect: All attacks against a creature or person with mage armour or shield have advantage. Requires attunement.

Snitches.Effect: The wielder can hear what’s going around the weapon. All standard passive and active perception stats are applied to the weapon. Requires attunement.

Shattering.Effect: On a critical hit, target loses 1 AC for the duration of combat. This effect does not stack. Requires attunement.

Voltaic.Effect: Adds 1D6 lightning damage on a successful hit. Requires attunement.

Tactician's.Effect: When below 20% health, the wielder and any allies within 15 ft may take 1 bonus free dash action on their turn.

St Strasser's.Effect: St Strasser was the only man in the church to face the omens of the coming magical age. Gain a +3 bonus to all Wisdom saving throws. Requires attunement.

Tomb Raider's.Effect: Trap detection DC is lowered by 3 when using this weapon. Requires attunement.

Duelist's.Effect: If the creature(s) you are currently engaged with misses you with a melee or ranged weapon attack on it's turn, you will have advantage when rolling to hit that creature on your turn.

Temple of Dewror.Effect: While the bearer is at 0 hp, they are visited by an angel of Dewror, the indomitable God. The bearer has advantage on death saving throws and cannot recall details about the angel if they wake. A long rest is required until this feature can be activated again. Requires attunement.

Tactician's.Effect: When below 20% health, the wielder and any allies within 15 ft may take 1 bonus free dash action on their turn.

St Strasser's.Effect: St Strasser was the only man in the church to face the omens of the coming magical age. Gain a +3 bonus to all Wisdom saving throws. Requires attunement.

Dungeon Crawler's.Effect: Trap detection DC is lowered by 3 when Wearing This Armour. Requires attunement.

Antivenom.Effect: This armour is coated with a dense elven laquer that deflects and detoxifies poisons. Grants +2 to all saving throws against poisin damage.

Duelist's.Effect: If the creature(s) you are currently engaged with misses you with a melee or ranged weapon attack on it's turn, you will have advantage when rolling to hit that creature on your turn.

Northern.Effect: The armour is manufactured to the standards of Marian, the Northern most County of Merthyr. Gain +3 AC when an enemy is attacking you with Cold damage.

Dousing.Effect: The armour bears a crude enchantment that produces great gouts of water when exposed to fire. Gain +3 AC when an enemy is attacking you with Fire damage. Requires attunement.

Antacid.Effect: The armour Is strongly resistant to acid damage. Gain +3 AC when an enemy is attacking you with Acid damage.

Enduring.Effect: The armour Is covered in a thin web of tiny plant roots. Gain +3 AC when an enemy is attacking you with necrotic damage. Requires attunement.

Opulent***.Effect: Rich decorations make this item more valuable at a trader.

St Silmaron's.Effect: St Silmaron founded an order of monks that dedicated themselves to freeing slaves and preaching for the freedom of all sentient creatures. Gain a +2 to all skill checks when attempting an escape. Requires attunement.

Superb***.Effect: +2 on rolls to hit and damage dice

Raging Magefire.Effect: Adds 1D8 fire damage to damage roll. Requires attunement (short rest). Target must succeed on a DC12 constitution saving throw or catch on fire. Fire deals 1D4 + the creatures challenge rating at the start of its turn until it succeeds on the saving throw.. Requires attunement (short rest)

Redeeming.Effect: Evil aligned creatures (non-humanoid) take an additional 1D8 radiant damage on a successful hit. Must succeed on a DC15 Wisdom save or be frightened of the attacker for 10 rounds or until line of sight is broken.

Possessed.Effect: Apparitions appear and tear into the selected target on a successful hit. Target takes 1D6 damage should they fail a DC10 wisdom saving throw. On a critical fail the wielder takes 1D8 damage if they fail the saving throw.

Freezing.Effect: Target takes 1D8 ice damage and target must succeed on a DC10 Constitution saving throw or become immobile until the saving throw is successful.

Profoundly Nullifying.Effect: Ignores AC bonuses given by spells such as mage armour and shield. Requires attunement.

Hexing.Effect: Once per long rest, a critical hit with this weapon will weaken one of the targets base stats. Roll a D6 to determine which one.

Adept Assassin\u2019s.Effect: This weapon can be placed next to any mundane item for one minute allowing the weapon to take this form. A DC20 investigation check is required for an NPC to discern it’s mystical property. The weapon will retake its original shape when an action is spent or after 1 day has passed.

Condemning.Effect: As a free action you may sacrifice 10 HP or use a 2nd level spell slot to curse your weapon and attempt to Doom an enemy. The next time you hit with an attack with this weapon, the creature you hit must succeed on a WIS save equal to 8+your proficiency bonus+half your spellcasting ability modifier(or  half your WIS modifier if you are not a caster) or become Doomed. Doomed creatures drop to 0 HP at the start if their 3rd turn after becoming Doomed.

Gambler\u2019s.Effect: The scabbard/chamber contains a pocket dimension that randomly selects an effect. This effect type is added to the standard damage dice for the weapon in question. Roll a D8 against the supplementary table

Siphoning.Effect: This weapon soaks in ethereal energy from all around it. Gain an extra level 2 spell slot. The spell slot takes 2 long rests to replenish once used.

Banisher\u2019s.Effect: Any demonic foe hit by this weapon must make a DC15 wisdom saving throw. On a fail the demon takes an extra 2D6 damage

Merciful.Effect: If the target has 10 health or less, roll an extra D10 damage dice on a hit. This effect happens once per combat encounter. Requires attunement.

Merciless.Effect: If the target is hit on full health, roll an extra D10 damage dice. This effect occurs once per combat enncounter. Requires attunement.

Consecrated Iron.Effect: When used against undead or demonic foes, the weapon does an additional 1D8 radiant damage.

Rending.Effect: On a critical hit, target loses 3 AC for the duration of combat. This effect does not stack. Requires attunement.

Fractionating.Effect: Once the wielder’s HP has been inflicted in wounds against opponents with this weapon, a decimating strike can be performed. If this ability hits, the target must make a DC15 constitution saving throw or lose 50% of their remaining HP. The target must be no larger than the wielder for this effect to be successful. Requires attunement.

Electrocuting.Effect: Target takes 1D8 additional lightning damage on a successful hit. The target must succeed on a DC12 constitution saving throw or become paralysed until they succeed on the saving throw. Requires attunement.

Bloody Saviour.Effect: When the wielder falls below 20% health they may use this attack as an action during their turn. On a successful hit, the target takes 3D6 necrotic damage healing the wielder up to half the damage dealt. Effect occurs once per long rest. Requires attunement

Pestilent.Effect: On a successful hit, the target takes an additional 2D8 acid damage. The creature must pass a DC20 constitution saving throw or become poisoned. The creature remains poisoned until it succeeds on the saving throw. Requires attunement.

Vampiric.Effect: On a  hit, the target must make a DC12 saving throw or take 3D6 necrotic damage. You are awarded HP up to half of the necrotic damage received. Requires attunement.

Muted.Effect: The weapon kills without a sound.

St Gaetano's.Effect: St Gaetano gathered invaluable knowledge on the evil forces and creatures of the world, yet was never corrupted by it. The user cannot be possessed. Requires attunement.

Trueflight.Effect: Arrows fired from this weapon ignore protection from cover.

Perfect****.Effect: +3 on rolls to hit and damage dice.

Unquenchable Magefire.Effect: Adds 2D8 fire damage to damage roll. Targets 10 ft either side must succeed on a DC15 dexterity saving throw or take 1D8 damage. Requires attunement (short rest).

Evangelising.Effect: Evil aligned targets take 1D12 radiant damage on a successful hit. Must succeed on a DC17 Wisdom save or be frightened of the attacker for 10 rounds or until line of sight is broken.

Glacial.Effect: Target takes 2D8 ice damage and target must succeed on a DC15 Constitution saving throw or become restrained until the saving throw is successful. Requires attunement.

Master Assassin\u2019s.Effect: This weapon passes any concealment checks as it is held within the mind of the bearer. It only coalesces once the bearer intends to do harm with it. It returns to its concealed state after a short rest. Requires attunement.

Petrifying.Effect: Holds intelligence modifier +1 charges per long rest. Before making a ranged attack, you can spend one charge to attempt to stun the creature you attacked. They must succeed on a DC17 Constitution save or become petrified for the next 24 hours. Requires attunement.

Deadeye.Effect: Headshot damage adds 3D8 additional damage if the target fails a DC15 dexterity saving throw. Requires attunement. Creature must have a head.

Silencing.Effect: Attacks against an opponent using mage armour or shield ignores the AC bonus they provide and deals an extra 1D8 damage, and ends the spell on a DC15 wisdom saving throw. Requires attunement.

Undertaker\u2019s.Effect: Any undead creature hit by this weapon must roll a DC15 wisdom saving throw. On a fail, the creature bursts into a cloud of radiant energy. Any other undead creature within 10 ft must take 1D8 radiant damage. Requires attunement.

Exorcist\u2019s.Effect: Any demonic creature killed by this weapon will open a sucking portal. Any other demonic creature within 10 ft of the dead demon must make a DC15 dexterity saving throw. On a fail, the demon takes 3D8 force damage and if it is killed it is also sucked through the portal. Requires attunement.

Sundering.Effect: On a critical hit, the targets AC value is reduced by 5 for the duration of the combat. This effect does not stack. Requires attunement.

Decimating.Effect: Once the wielder’s HP has been inflicted in wounds against opponents with this weapon, a decimating strike can be performed. If this ability hits, the target must make a DC18 constitution saving throw or lose 90% of their remaining HP. The target must be a large enemy or smaller for this effect to be successful. Requires attunement.

Infinite****.Effect: The weapon contains an inexhaustible ammunition supply. Can multiattack up to two enemies per turn.

Reincarnating****.Effect: Instead of reloading this weapon, you may throw it at the target up to a range of 50 ft (light) or 30 ft (heavy). All targets within 10 ft must succeed on a  a DC15 dexterity saving throw or take 1D12 damage x the number of loaded barrels. Once exploded, the weapon magically reappears in its holster. Requires attunement.

Exorcist\u2019s.Effect: The armour is protected by ancient magic and will sear the skin of any Demon or Devil that touches it. When a Demon or Devil successfully hits the bearer, the creature must make a DC20 constitution saving throw or take 1D8 radiant damage. Requires attunement.

Spellguard.Effect: Any spellcaster attacking the wearer has disadvantage. The wearer has advantage on all saving throws against spells and magical effects. Requires attunement.

Blood Thirsty.Effect: Adds 1D12 bludgeoning damage to unarmed strikes

Supercooled.Effect: The armour is magically supercooled and is further charged by incoming cold damage. Gain +5 to AC against cold damage and if damage is taken, half of this amount can be dealt to an enemy that you successfully hit on your next turn.

Fire-Eater's.Effect: The armour is magically charged by incoming Fire damage. Gain +5 to AC against Fire damage and if damage is taken, half of this amount can be dealt as bonus damage to an enemy that you successfully hit on your next turn. Requires attunement.

Caustic.Effect: The armour magically Drips with acidic fluid when worn. Gain +5 to AC against Acid damage and if damage is taken, half of this amount can be dealt as bonus damage to an enemy that you successfully hit on your next turn. Requires attunement.

Faraday.Effect: The armour Crackles with barely contained sparks of electricity. Gain +5 to AC against Lightning damage and if damage is taken, half of this amount can be dealt as bonus damage to an enemy that you successfully hit on your next turn. Requires attunement.

Phantom.Effect: Once per day, you may speak the command word and the armour will transport the wearer into the ethereal plane, allowing the wearer to pass through one wall of any thickness. Requires attunement.

Monster Hunter's.Effect: Creatures of the Monstrosities type have disadvantage on all perception checks made against the wearer. The Wearer always rolls with advantage to hit a monstrosity. Requires attunement.

Angelic.Effect: The armour allows the wearer to fly up to a distance of their speed + 15 feet before needing to land. Requires attunement.

Aquatic.Effect: Allows the wearer to swim underwater indefinitely.

Beast Master's.Effect: The wearer gains +5 to animal handling checks. Requires attunement.

Admiral's.Effect: Treat this as a +3 armour whenever you are on the water.

Huntsman's.Effect: Treat this as a +3 armour whenever you are in a forest.

Purifying.Effect: This armour is blessed with Elven enchantments that deflect and detoxify poisons. Grants +5 to all saving throws against poisin damage. Requires attunement.

Regenerating.Effect: You gain 1D10 hitpoints back every ten rounds during combat, so long as you have at least 1 HP. If you lose a limb, the limb will grow back over 1D6 +1 days. Requires attunement.

Miraculous.Effect: Grants the ability to walk on water. Requires attunement.
